modName: Dragon Priest Red Lord -skin- by SicSicSix
descriptionHtml:
Changes the appearance of the Dragon Priest for something scarier


::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

   Install:
Just unzip the data folder C:Program Files\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\Data\
or use the NMM(recommended)

  Uninstall:
Just delete this folders
C:Program Files\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\Data\textures\creatures\dragonpriest
author: Elvis SicSicSix
